name: Destroy All Goblins
description:
Early Access! Super-duper work-in-progress. More to come soon, including more weapons, power-ups, and polish. I'd love your feedback!

The goblin onslaught won't cease. The Frog King has sent you, Frog, on a mission to... DESTROY ALL GOBLINS.

Collect stars to get more points. Every time you get a star, your weapon changes. Take out those gobbos, aim for the high-score, and feel the thrill of a great run!

Make use of four different weapons to stop those gosh dang goblins: peashooter, trishooter, dualie, and machine gun.

But watch out for enraged goblins, I've heard their extra dangerous...

This is my first released game that's larger than a jam project or little prototype, and I want to build it out in the open. Release early, release often. I want to get real feedback!

The game isn't done yet, so there may be some bugs and issues.

Help make Destroy All Goblins the best game it can be by getting involved in the itch.io community, reporting bugs, and letting me know what you'd like to see!

Here's what's coming:

  • More weapons
  • Power-ups
  • Variant goblins
Support Me

If you want to support me and my continued development of games, donate by buying the game, follow me on itch.io, or subscribe to my newsletter.

Thank you for your support!

Credits

Design, music, code, and art by Brett Chalupa. Many of the sprites in the current version are from the Public Domain and made by Pixel Frog.

Inspired by Super Crate Box, Mario Bros., and Towerfall.

Made with DragonRuby Game Toolkit.
